Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\caching\GroupDependency

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\caching\GroupDependency » yii\caching\Dependency » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Available since version2.0
Source Code
GroupDependency marks a cached data item with a group name.

You may invalidate the cached data items with the same group name all at once by calling invalidate().

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$data mixed The dependency data that is saved in cache and later is compared with the latest dependency data yii\caching\Dependency
$reusable boolean Whether this dependency is reusable or not yii\caching\Dependency
$group string The group name yii\caching\GroupDependency

Property Details

$group property
string $group = null

The group name. This property must be set.

Method Details

getHasChanged() method
boolean getHasChanged( $cache )
$cache yii\caching\Cache The cache component that is currently evaluating this dependency
return boolean whether the dependency is changed or not.
throws yii\base\InvalidConfigException if $group is not set.

Performs the actual dependency checking.

generateDependencyData() method
mixed generateDependencyData( $cache )
$cache yii\caching\Cache The cache component that is currently evaluating this dependency
return mixed the data needed to determine if dependency has been changed.
throws yii\base\InvalidConfigException if $group is not set.

Generates the data needed to determine if dependency has been changed.

This method does nothing in this class.

invalidate() method
string invalidate( $cache, $group )
$cache yii\caching\Cache The cache component that caches the data items
$group string The group name
return string the current version number

Invalidates all of the cached data items that have the same $group.
